resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.

fields.summary: Build broken by datanucleus.org being offline

comments.body: This is weird: http://www.datanucleus.org/ throwing 403 access denied.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
